code: import moment from"moment";import{DateFormats}from"./date-formats";export var twoHours=120;export var hourAndHalf=90;export function getDiffInMinutes(startTime,endTime){var startTimeFormatted=moment(startTime,DateFormats.TIME_EXTENDED);var endTimeFormatted=moment(endTime,DateFormats.TIME_EXTENDED);var msDiff=startTimeFormatted.diff(endTimeFormatted);var date=moment.duration(msDiff);var minutes=date.asMinutes()*-1;return minutes;}export function getDiffInHours(startTime,endTime){var startTimeFormatted=moment(startTime,DateFormats.TIME_EXTENDED);var endTimeFormatted=moment(endTime,DateFormats.TIME_EXTENDED);var msDiff=startTimeFormatted.diff(endTimeFormatted);var date=moment.duration(msDiff);var diffMinutes=date.asMinutes()*-1;return"".concat(Math.floor(diffMinutes/60),"h").concat(diffMinutes%60,"m");}
